lyrics:
13 contributorshappy birthday lyricsverse 1 john legend
beautiful beautiful no other name
i knew from the moment you came
ive seen in your eyes the dawn of a day
where nothing will ever be the same

prechorus john legend
feel my heart beating through my chest
ill get used to just saying yes
yes ill love you with all i am
yes tonight is where we began

chorus john legend
ooh i wanna dance with you
ooh ill promise to stand for you oh oh oh
ooh ooh ooh ill do anything for you
oh yeah oh yeah tonight my love all i want
i wanna sing for you
yeah ill sing for you
happy birthday baby
happy birthday to you
happy birthday baby
happy birthday to you

verse 2 john legend
wrap you in love for the rest of my days
pray you find joy through your pain
i cant protect you from every heartbreak
the world isnt easy that way
see kygo liveget tickets as low as 78you might also likeprechorus john legend
but ill be there for you when you crawl
dad will pick you up when you fall
yes ill love you with all i am
yes tonight is where we began

chorus john legend
ooh i wanna dance with you
ooh ill promise to stand for you oh oh oh
ooh ooh ooh ill do anything for you
oh yeah oh yeah tonight my love all i want
i wanna sing for you
yeah ill sing for you
